column5: Thanks, now I don't have to watch it.  Some of us have pvrs and other things going on.  No more spoilers please.  Or I'm going to start telling people how many fish they are going catch before they head out.
good to know i wasnt the only one that sat through all that ....good the orange chick lost her gas ....

LOL So how long whould we keep the secret?  Maybe you wont have time to watch untill tommorow night, so say 24hr is that a good enough buffer before we talk about canada getting a medal?  Next thread Ill make sure you have to click the topic to find out if we won or not just for the one's who pvr

If I was working nights or whatever shift during which an event is finishing I think I'd like to leave the radio off and hope to be able to enjoy the excitement on PVR or whatever. I plan to record some hockey games and hopefully no one will spoil those results for me. Kinda sux to sit thru a game when you know how it finishes.  JF
